snippet: The government approved on Tuesday a controversial $51 billion high-speed rail line linking London to Birmingham, Manchester and Leeds.
abstract: British government approves a controversial $51 billion high-speed rail line linking London to Birmingham, Manchester and Leeds.
lead_paragraph: The government approved on Tuesday a controversial $51 billion high-speed rail line linking London to Birmingham, Manchester and Leeds.

headline.main: Britain: Plan Set for Fast Trains
headline.print_headline: Britain: Plan Set for Fast Trains
